nonEssentialQuestionsArray.questionText: Do you plan to resell admission tickets to places of entertainment and charge more than the original price?
Do you plan to own a multiple dwelling, such as an apartment or condominium complex?
Do you plan to own a hotel, motel, or guesthouse with 10 rooms or more?
Do you plan to own and/or operate a carnival or amusement ride?
Do you plan to own and/or operate a traveling carnival or circus?
Do you plan to serve food?
Do you plan to serve liquor, including beer or wine?
Do you plan to use a weighing or measuring device, such as a scale or meter, for your business?
Are you a dentist?
Does your dental office generate amalgam waste?
Do you specialize in any area of dentistry, such as orthodontics or oral surgery?
Are you a dental hygienist?
Do you plan to own and/or operate a `free-standing residential health care facility?|residential-health-care-facility`
Do you plan to own and/or operate a rooming or boarding house?
Do you plan to provide entertainment booking services in New Jersey?
Do you plan to offer electrologist/electrolysis services?
Do you plan to store sodium pentobarbital for animal euthanasia?
Do you plan to train dogs to detect illegal substances?
Do you plan to test or research Controlled Dangerous Substances (CDS)?
Do you plan to make, buy, or sell products that contain Controlled Dangerous Substances (CDS)?
Do you plan to sell cigarettes, have a cigarette vending machine, or be a cigarette manufacturer sales representative?
Do you plan to offer professional planning services?
Do you plan to be using x-ray machines?
Are you an optometrist?
Do you plan to deliver packages by air (for example, by airplane or helicopter)?
Do you plan to fall under [one of these industries](https://www.nj.gov/dep/enforcement/opppc/crtk/rtknaics.pdf)?
Do you plan to sell lawn and garden supplies, flowers, or florists’ supplies?
Do you plan to do management consulting services (not including manufacturing management, physical distribution, and site location consulting)?
Do you plan to sell pesticides?
Do you plan to sell pesticides?
Do you plan to use pesticides or offer pesticide application services?
Will you be constructing and/or operating a crematory?
Will your business or facility use a boiler with a significant heating capacity?
Will your business have `Regulated Medical Waste (RMW)|regulated-medical-waste` ?
Will you operate vehicles over 26,000 pounds, or that have 3 or more axles, in 2 or more states or Canadian provinces?
Will your business or facility use a large pressure vessel (a vessel without a "UM" stamp)?
Will your business or facility use a large refrigerator or cooling system?
Will your business use commercial vehicles, such as school or shuttle buses, to transport passengers?
Will you sell, solicit, or negotiate insurance products?
Will you sell milk or other milk products, such as yogurt or cream?
Will you buy products for resale, or will you sell products to resellers?
“Will your business provide intrastate transportation of passengers to and from **casinos in Atlantic city,** or **in exchange for compensation** from passengers or groups?”
You are a demo industry user. This is an example non-essential question that is being used to add an Anytime Action. Answering "yes" will add the Anytime Action "Demo Anytime Action".
Do you plan to install, repair, or modify wells for your customer’s business?
Will your business sell or lease 4 or more vehicles or boats in a given year?
Will your business use commercial vehicles weighing over 26,000 pounds to haul loads or transport passengers?
Will you or your company work with asbestos?
Does your business have an underground storage tank?
Do you plan to transport solid or medical waste generated by your business?
Do you plan to sell products or services in other states?
